# The `PrettyStackTraceProgram` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceprogram">PrettyStackTraceProgram</a> - This object prints a specified program arguments to the stream as the stack trace when a crash occurs. <a href="#details">More...</a>
